/github/simgrid/simgrid-3.26/build/smpi_script/bin/smpif90    -g -flto -fno-fat-lto-objects CMakeFiles/fort_args.dir/fort_args/fort_args.f90.o  -o fort_args/fort_args  -Wl,-rpath,/github/simgrid/simgrid-3.26/build/lib ../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.26 ../../lib/libmpi.so /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libboost_context.so.1.71.0 -lpthread -lm  -lunwind-ptrace -lunwind-generic -lunwind -lrt /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed
